tasks.title: Complete Investor Authentication System
tasks.description: Finalize the investor authentication, registration, and login system with proper email verification and navigation
tasks.details: Complete the authentication work that was in progress: 1) Fix authentication service to fetch user data correctly, 2) Ensure email verification status displays from auth.users.email_confirmed_at, 3) Fix investor navigation menus (Dashboard, Browse Offerings, My Portfolio, Profile), 4) Ensure ProtectedRoute works with user roles, 5) Fix loading states and blank screens, 6) Complete investor profile with verification status, 7) Test full registration/login flow end-to-end
tasks.testStrategy: Test complete registration flow, verify email verification displays correctly, ensure navigation works for investors, test login/logout cycles, verify protected routes work properly

tasks.title: Database Schema Implementation
tasks.description: Design and implement comprehensive database schema for investment platform including offerings, portfolios, and compliance tracking
tasks.details: Create tables for investment_offerings, user_portfolios, investments, companies, documents, compliance_records, and audit_logs. Implement proper relationships, constraints, and indexes. Set up RLS policies for data security.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify all tables created correctly, test RLS policies, ensure proper relationships and constraints work as expected

tasks.testStrategy: Test filtering and search functionality, verify mobile responsiveness, ensure performance with large datasets

tasks.title: Company Profile Pages
